column4: hello, i just installed ubuntu but having some problems with apt-get
i have modified sources.list and try a apt-get update
it stall there with connection timeout
any pointers please
I can reach say http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu thru my browser
but when i do apt-get update it simply fails to connect
have you enabled all your sources?
in synaptic?
open a terminal
you on ubuntu or kubuntu?
whats your default text editer (gui)?
sudo kate /etc/apt/sources.list
check out the one for your version
I notice the sources.list at that link does not include your kubuntu CD packages...you can add the CD again by going into synaptic and choosing 'Add CD' in the menus
thanks mate apt is working now, at the same time i switched to ubuntu
np
did you add your CD back in synaptic?
you mght have overwritten the line that points synaptic to the CD
go into synaptic and find 'add cd' in the menus
cool
pleasure  your qualified synaptic tutor now :D
his fstab is at http://paste.ubuntulinux.nl/3202
